item.title: [508] How to recolor items
item.dc:creator: @dragmagic dragmagic
item.description:
@dragmagic wrote:

ok first off im just releaseing how and its a really good system me and zyle came up with but anyways dont turn 508’s into 317 recolor shit please dont go making purple daroks and all that shit… there is no use…

first off go to to ur itemdef.java add this method

public void recolor(short[][] colorConfig) { try { int amount = colorConfig[0].length; aShortArray342 = new short[amount]; aShortArray332 = new short[amount]; for(int index = 0; index < amount; index++) { aShortArray342[index] = colorConfig[0][index]; aShortArray332[index] = colorConfig[1][index]; } } catch(Exception error) { error.printStackTrace(); } } now go to your applet sub1

add this

public static short[][] colorConfig;next add this with the all the other items

case 4087: colorConfig = new short[][] { { 926,912 }, { 0,391 } }; class19.recolor(colorConfig); break;now how this works is

in this 2d array the yellow number is the orginal color and the red number below it is the color for it to be changed to and all you need to do to add a new one is just put a number on the top and on the bottom ya that ez omfg way better then 317 lol

colorConfig = new short[][] { { 926,912 }, { 0,391 } };

Read full topic
